title: The Last Wave [DVD] (A)
creator_credit: Peter Weir, James McElroy, Hal McElroy and Ayer Productions
brief_description: In this atmospheric mystery thriller a young Sydney lawyer, while defending Aborigines against a murder charge, is troubled by dreams and is drawn into an underground world, the intimations of an ancient civilization. Step by step a series of apparently random occurences assume a disturbing pattern. The city becomes a facade for a place of ancient ritual. Cast includes Richard Chamberlain and David Gulpilil and features photography by Russell Boyd. Features a digitally restored soundtrack.
